timeline

1. Get the Project token

Click on the button in the upper right corner and copy the Project token.

2. Add Mambas callback

  • info Keras
  • location_on PyTorch
  • gavel Theano
  • from mambas.keras.callback import MambasCallback
  • ...
  • token = '<project_token>'
  • callback = MambasCallback(token)
  • model.fit(x_train, y_train, callbacks=[callback])
